The innovative food

Ramen is a popular Japanese dish. It consists of wheat noodles served in a meat or fish based broth with some toppings such as sliced pork and bamboo shoots. Ramen is originally from China, but the dish has been developed dramatically in Japan. It's diversified, affordable and phenomenal!

The Master

How to cook ramen

Metropolises have good ramen restaurants

You are lucky because you can enjoy fully fledged ramen dishes in US. Most of them are located in major cities. I am confident that the restaurants in the following table are worth trying. When you visit the cities, don't miss it!

Location Restaurant
Chicago Ramen Takeya
New York Ippudo
Los Angels Tsujita
San Francisco Mensho Tokyo
San Diego Tajima
